Mod.name: Copi's Twitchy Lua
Mod.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/5aDRWYk.png[/img]
[HR][/HR] Run code straight from twitch chat! In real time, within the safe API, this mod allows you to run code.
As twitch has bad formatting, you must write your code on one single line, but fear not! In Lua, you can separate lines with a semicolon (;) or write multiple lines to a file and call the file later.
Messages starting with [code]LUA: [/code] will be treated like code, with the [code]LUA: [/code] bit removed. Example code: [code]LUA: ThisIsAFunction(2, 5);IAmAFunctionOnAnotherLine() --this is line 2;[/code]
[u][b][i]Attributions and Thanks[/i][/b][/u] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/vdslns/]Dextercd[/url] [list][*]Allowing this mod to exist, with excellent knowledge of Lua and endless support.[/list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198095307975/]NathanSkimScam[/url] [list][*]Presenting a solution to the mod's biggest flaw[/list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198165288511/myworkshopfiles/]Horscht[/url] [list][*]Pointing me to a function which made detecting errors easy.[/list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/bruham/]Bruham[/url] [list][*]Inspiring the mod, and modding tricks used in prior versions of the mod[/list] [/list]
[u][b][i]Mod Settings[/i][/b][/u] [list] [*]Power User(s) [list][*]Unless pandemonium is enabled, only the Power User many run code.[/list] [list][*]Must match the twitch username of the user.[/list] [list][*]Space separated list (e.g. CopiHuman Conga_Lyne).[/list] [*]Pandemonium [list][*]Allows anyone to run code.[/list] [list][*]Possibly risky. Use with care.[/list] [*]Chaos [list][*]Disables protections on all functions.[/list] [list][*][b]VERY DANGEROUS[/b]. Use with care.[/list] [/list]
[u][b][i]Preset Variables[/i][/b][/u] [list] [*]Player [list][*]Returns a reference to the first player entity[/list] [*]Px, Py, Pr, Psx, Psy [list][*]Returns the transform data of the first player entity[/list] [*]Mx, My [list][*]Returns the cursor position[/list] [*]Cx, Cy [list][*]Returns the camera position[/list] [*]Ploop(func) [list][*]Iterates over all players, executing func(player) on them[/list] [*]Comp [list][*]EntityGetFirstComponentIncludingDisabled[/list] [/list]
[u][b][i]Warnings[/i][/b][/u] Even I don't know the full extent of this mod's capabilities, and I take no responsibility for any damages done with it. I, Copi, and anyone else affiliated with this project are not responsible for your misuse of this mod. Beware of malicious users!
